001package com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.client;
002
003import android.net.Uri;
004import android.util.Log;
005
006import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
007
008import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.client.DistributedIdClient;
009import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.client.LinkHandler;
010import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.client.MessageHandler;
011import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.client.OpenIDVerifiableCredentialsClient;
012import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.client.service.model.ApplicationInstance;
013import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.client.service.model.Challenge;
014import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.types.Claim;
015import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.types.Share;
016import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.CredentialRequest;
017import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.regions.PingOneRegion;
018import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.utils.BackgroundThreadHandler;
019
020import java.util.List;
021import java.util.Map;
022import java.util.UUID;
023import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
024import java.util.function.Consumer;
025
026import io.reactivex.rxjava3.android.schedulers.AndroidSchedulers;
027import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Completable;
028import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Observable;
029import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
030import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.Disposable;
031import io.reactivex.rxjava3.schedulers.Schedulers;
032
033@SuppressWarnings({"unused", "UnusedReturnValue"})
034public class NetworkManager {
035
036    static final String TAG = NetworkManager.class.getSimpleName();
037
038    private final DistributedIdClient distributedIdClient;
039    private final LinkHandler linkHandler;
040    private OpenIDVerifiableCredentialsClient openIDVerifiableCredentialsClient;
041
042    private ApplicationInstance applicationInstance;
043
044    NetworkManager(PingOneRegion walletRegion, @NonNull final ApplicationInstance applicationInstance, @NonNull final MessageHandler messageHandler, final LinkHandler linkHandler) {
045        this.linkHandler = linkHandler;
046        this.applicationInstance = applicationInstance;
047        distributedIdClient = new DistributedIdClient.Builder(applicationInstance, messageHandler)
048                .withBaseUrl(walletRegion.getBaseUrl())
049                .build();
050        if (linkHandler != null) {
051            distributedIdClient.setLinkHandler(linkHandler);
052        }
053    }
054
055    void updateApplicationInstance(@NonNull final ApplicationInstance applicationInstance) {
056        this.distributedIdClient.updateApplicationInstance(applicationInstance);
057        this.applicationInstance = applicationInstance;
058    }
059
060    public ApplicationInstance getApplicationInstance() {
061        return applicationInstance;
062    }
063
064    void processUrl(@NonNull final String qrUrl, Consumer<Exception> exceptionHandler) {
065        BackgroundThreadHandler.singleBackgroundThreadHandler().post(() -> {
066            String requestUrl = extractRequestUrl(qrUrl);
067            if (requestUrl == null) {
068                requestUrl = qrUrl;
069            }
070            try {
071                distributedIdClient.processUrl(requestUrl);
072            } catch (Exception e) {
073                exceptionHandler.accept(e);
074            }
075        });
076    }
077
078    public static String extractRequestUrl(String qrUrl) {
079        Uri uri = Uri.parse(qrUrl);
080        String urlParam = uri.getQueryParameter("u");
081        if (urlParam == null) {
082            return qrUrl;
083        }
084        return Uri.parse(urlParam).toString();
085    }
086
087    public static String extractBaseUrl(String qrUrl) {
088        String url = extractRequestUrl(qrUrl);
089        Uri hostUri = Uri.parse(url);
090        return hostUri.getHost();
091    }
092
093    Single<Claim> createSelfClaim(@NonNull final Map<String, String> map) {
094        return Single.fromCallable(() -> distributedIdClient.createClaimForSelf(map))
095                .subscribeOn(Schedulers.io())
096                .observeOn(AndroidSchedulers.mainThread())
097                .doOnError(throwable -> Log.e(TAG, "Failed to create self-claim", throwable));
098    }
099
100    Completable shareData(@NonNull final CredentialRequest credentialRequest, @NonNull final List<Share> shares) {
101        return Completable.fromRunnable(() -> {
102                    UUID recipientId = UUID.fromString(credentialRequest.getApplicationInstanceId());
103                    Challenge c = new Challenge();
104                    c.setId(credentialRequest.getSessionId());
105                    distributedIdClient.shareData(recipientId, credentialRequest.getMessage(), c, shares);
106                }).subscribeOn(Schedulers.io())
107                .observeOn(AndroidSchedulers.mainThread());
108    }
109
110    Completable sendSecureMessage(String issuer, String json, Challenge challenge) {
111        return Completable.fromRunnable(() -> {
112            final UUID recipientId = UUID.fromString(issuer);
113            distributedIdClient.sendSecureMessage(recipientId, json, challenge);
114        });
115
116    }
117
118    Disposable subscribeOnNewMessages() {
119        return Observable.interval(0, 5, TimeUnit.SECONDS)
120                .map(n -> processMessages())
121                .observeOn(AndroidSchedulers.mainThread())
122                .subscribe();
123    }
124
125    Disposable processMessages() {
126        return Completable.fromRunnable(distributedIdClient::processMessages)
127                .subscribeOn(Schedulers.io())
128                .observeOn(AndroidSchedulers.mainThread()).subscribe(
129                        () -> Log.d(TAG, "processMessages success"),
130                        e -> Log.e(TAG, "Failed to process message", e)
131                );
132    }
133
134    Completable requestShare(String shocardId, String message, String challengeId, List<String> requestKeys) {
135        return Completable.fromRunnable(() -> {
136            final UUID recipientId = UUID.fromString(shocardId);
137            final Challenge challenge = new Challenge();
138            challenge.setId(challengeId);
139            distributedIdClient.requestShare(recipientId, message, challenge, requestKeys);
140        }).subscribeOn(Schedulers.io()).observeOn(AndroidSchedulers.mainThread()).doOnError(throwable -> Log.e(TAG, "Failed to request data", throwable));
141    }
142
143}
